title: cooked beef fillet with horseradish mash, wild mushroom tortellini and red wine sauce
description: You will need a pasta machine for this recipe.
ingredients: 550g/1lb 4oz '00' pasta flour, plus extra for dusting
500g/1lb 2oz potato, peeled and cut into 5cm/2in cubes
2-3 tsp grated fresh horseradish root, or to taste
salt and freshly ground black pepper
salt and freshly ground black pepper
500ml/18fl oz red wine, simmered in a pan until the volume of liquid has reduced to 200ml/7fl oz
salt and freshly ground black pepper
